Description: MLB: Assists - Number of times a fielder assists in an out.
MLB: At Bats - Number of times a player faces a pitcher.
MLB: Active Status - Indicates if a franchise is currently active.
2025-03-22 MLB: Hardcoded MultiValue attribute
MLB: Attendance - Total number of spectators at home games.
MLB: Award ID - Identifier for a manager’s award.
MLB: Ballots - Number of ballots cast for Hall of Fame voting.
MLB: Batting Average Against - Opponents’ batting average against a pitcher.
MLB: Bats - Player’s batting hand (e.g., left, right, both).
2025-03-22 MLB: Hardcoded MultiValue attribute
MLB: Base on Balls - Number of walks a batter receives.
MLB: Bases on Balls Allowed - Walks allowed by a team’s pitchers.
MLB: Baseball-Reference ID - Unique identifier from Baseball-Reference.
MLB: Batters Faced by Pitcher - Total batters a pitcher faces.
MLB: Birth City - City where a player was born.
MLB: Birth Country - Country where a player was born.
MLB: Birth Day - Day of the month a player was born.
MLB: Birth Month - Month a player was born.
MLB: Birth State - State where a player was born.
MLB: Birth Year - Year a player was born.
MLB: Balks - Illegal pitching actions by a pitcher.
MLB: Batter Park Factor - Effect of park on batting stats.
MLB: Category - Role or type for Hall of Fame nominee (e.g., player, manager).
MLB: Complete Games - Games pitched entirely by one pitcher.
MLB: City - Location city of a ballpark.
MLB: Caught Stealing - Times a runner is caught stealing a base.
MLB: Death City - City where a player passed away.
MLB: Death Country - Country where a player passed away.
MLB: Death Day - Day of the month a player passed away.
MLB: Death Month - Month a player passed away.
MLB: Death State - State where a player passed away.
MLB: Death Year - Year a player passed away.
MLB: Debut - Date of a player’s first MLB game.
MLB: Division ID - Identifier for a team’s division.
MLB: Division Win - Indicates if a team won its division.
MLB: Double Plays - Number of double plays a fielder participated in.
MLB: Errors - Number of fielding mistakes by a player.
MLB: Earned Runs - Runs allowed by a pitcher due to hits/errors.
MLB: Earned Run Average - Average earned runs allowed per 9 innings.
2025-03-22 MLB: Hardcoded MultiValue attribute
MLB: Final Game - Date of a player’s last MLB game.
MLB: Fielding Percentage - Ratio of successful fielding plays.
MLB: Franchise ID - Unique identifier for a team franchise.
MLB: Franchise Name - Official name of a team franchise.
MLB: Games - Number of games a player participated in.
MLB: Games at First Base - Games played at first base.
MLB: Games at Second Base - Games played at second base.
MLB: Games at Third Base - Games played at third base.
MLB: Games All - Total games played in any role.
MLB: Games Batting - Games where a player batted.
MLB: Games as Catcher - Games played as a catcher.
MLB: Games in Center Field - Games played in center field.
MLB: Games on Defense - Games played in a defensive position.
MLB: Games as Designated Hitter - Games played as a DH.
MLB: Games in Left Field - Games played in left field.
MLB: Games in Outfield - Total games played in the outfield.
MLB: Games as Pitcher - Games pitched.
MLB: Games as Pinch Hitter - Games batted as a substitute.
MLB: Games as Pinch Runner - Games run as a substitute.
MLB: Games in Right Field - Games played in right field.
MLB: Games at Shortstop - Games played at shortstop.
MLB: Game ID - Unique identifier for an All-Star game.
MLB: Game Number - Number of All-Star games in a season.
MLB: Games - Number of home games played.
MLB: Games in Center Field - Outfield games in center.
MLB: Games Finished - Games a pitcher completed.
MLB: Home Games - Number of games played at home.
MLB: Grounded Into Double Play - Times a batter hits into a double play.
MLB: Games in Left Field - Outfield games in left.
MLB: Games Played - All-Star games a player participated in.
MLB: Games in Right Field - Outfield games in right.
MLB: Games Started - Games a player started.
MLB: Hits - Number of successful hits by a batter.
MLB: Hits Allowed - Hits allowed by a team’s pitchers.
MLB: Half - Season half (1st or 2nd) for manager stats.
MLB: Hit By Pitch - Times a batter is hit by a pitch.
MLB: Height - Player’s height in inches.
MLB: Home Runs - Number of home runs hit by a batter.
MLB: Home Runs Allowed - Home runs allowed by a team’s pitchers.
MLB: Intentional Base on Balls - Intentional walks given to a batter.
MLB: Inducted - Indicates if a person was inducted into the Hall of Fame.
MLB: Innings Outs - Total outs recorded while fielding.
MLB: In-Season - Manager’s order of appointment within a season.
MLB: Innings Pitched Outs - Total outs pitched by a pitcher.
MLB: Losses - Number of games lost under a manager.
MLB: League Key - Identifier for a team’s league.
MLB: League ID - Identifier for a player’s league.
MLB: League ID Loser - League of the losing team in postseason.
MLB: League ID Winner - League of the winning team in postseason.
MLB: League Win - Indicates if a team won its league.
MLB: Losses - Number of losses in a postseason series.

MLB: National Association - Associated NA franchise.
MLB: Team Name - Official name of a team.
MLB: Full Name - Full name of a school.
MLB: First Name - Player’s first name.
MLB: Given Name - Player’s full given name.
MLB: Last Name - Player’s last name.
MLB: Needed Votes - Votes required for Hall of Fame induction.
MLB: Needed Note - Additional notes on vote requirements.
MLB: Notes - Additional comments on manager awards.
MLB: Openings - Number of opening games at home.
MLB: Park - Name of a team’s home ballpark.
MLB: Park Alias - Alternative name for a ballpark.
MLB: Park Key - Unique identifier for a ballpark.
MLB: Park Name - Official name of a ballpark.
MLB: Passed Balls - Balls a catcher fails to catch.
2025-03-22 MLB: Hardcoded MultiValue attribute
MLB: Player ID - Unique identifier for a player.
MLB: Player-Manager - Indicates if a manager also played.
MLB: Putouts - Number of outs recorded by a fielder.
MLB: Maximum Points - Total possible points for an award.
MLB: Points Won - Points received for an award.
MLB: Position - Fielding position played.
MLB: Pitcher Park Factor - Effect of park on pitching stats.
MLB: Runs - Number of runs scored by a player.
MLB: Runs Allowed - Runs allowed by a team.
MLB: Rank - Manager’s team ranking in standings.
MLB: Runs Batted In - Runs driven in by a batter.
MLB: Retro ID - Unique identifier from Retrosheet.
MLB: Round - Postseason round (e.g., World Series).
MLB: Salary - Player’s annual salary.
MLB: Stolen Bases - Bases successfully stolen by a player.
MLB: School ID - Identifier for a player’s college.
MLB: Sacrifice Flies - Fly balls that score a run.
MLB: Sacrifice Hits - Bunts that advance a runner.
MLB: Shutouts - Games pitched with no runs allowed.
MLB: Strikeouts - Times a batter strikes out.
MLB: Strikeouts Allowed - Strikeouts by a team’s pitchers.
MLB: Span First - Start date of home game span.
MLB: Span Last - End date of home game span.
MLB: Starting Position - Position a player started in All-Star game.
MLB: State - State where a ballpark is located.
MLB: Stint - Order of a player’s team stint in a season.
MLB: Saves - Games a pitcher preserves a lead.
MLB: Team Key - Unique identifier for a team.
MLB: Team ID - Identifier for a player’s team.
MLB: Team ID BR - Baseball-Reference team identifier.
MLB: Team ID Lahman - Lahman database team identifier.
MLB: Team ID Loser - Identifier for losing team in postseason.
MLB: Team ID Retro - Retrosheet team identifier.
MLB: Team ID Winner - Identifier for winning team in postseason.
MLB: Throws - Player’s throwing hand (e.g., left, right).
MLB: Tie - Indicates if an award vote was tied.
MLB: Ties - Number of tied games in a postseason series.
MLB: Triple Plays - Number of triple plays in postseason.
MLB: Voted By - Group or committee voting for Hall of Fame.
MLB: Votes - Number of votes received for Hall of Fame.
MLB: First Place Votes - Number of first-place award votes.
MLB: Wins - Number of games won under a manager.
MLB: Wild Card Win - Indicates if a team won a wild card.
MLB: Weight - Player’s weight in pounds.
MLB: Wins - Number of wins in a postseason series.
MLB: Wild Pitches - Pitches a catcher cannot control.
MLB: World Series Win - Indicates if a team won the World Series.
MLB: Doubles - Number of two-base hits by a batter.
MLB: Triples - Number of three-base hits by a batter.
MLB: Year Key - Year of home game data.
MLB: Year ID - Year of an All-Star game or event.
MLB: Zone Rating - Measure of fielding range efficiency.
